item.text:
This is the record of the family line of Adam.

When God created humankind, he made them in the likeness of God.
He created them male and female; when they were created, he blessed them and named them “humankind.”
When Adam had lived 130 years he fathered a son in his own likeness, according to his image, and he named him Seth.

The length of <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> <st data-num="0121" class="">Adam</st> lived<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="08352" class="">Seth</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="08083 03967">800</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>; during this time he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st><n id="2" /> other<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Adam was 930 years, and then he died.
When Seth had lived 105 years, he became the father of Enosh.

<st data-num="08352" class="">Seth</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="07651 08083 03967">807</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="0583" class="">Enosh</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st><n id="1" /> other<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Seth was 912 years, and then he died.
When Enosh had lived 90 years, he became the father of Kenan.

<st data-num="0583" class="">Enosh</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="02568 06240 08083 03967">815</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="07018" class="">Kenan</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Enosh was 905 years, and then he died.
When Kenan had lived 70 years, he became the father of Mahalalel.

<st data-num="07018" class="">Kenan</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="0705 08083 03967">840</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="04111" class="">Mahalalel</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Kenan was 910 years, and then he died.
When Mahalalel had lived 65 years, he became the father of Jared.

<st data-num="04111" class="">Mahalalel</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="07970 08083 03967">830</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="03382" class="">Jared</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Mahalalel was 895 years, and then he died.
When Jared had lived 162 years, he became the father of Enoch.

<st data-num="03382" class="">Jared</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="08083 03967">800</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="02585" class="">Enoch</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Jared was 962 years, and then he died.
When Enoch had lived 65 years, he became the father of Methuselah.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="04968" class="">Methuselah</st>, <st data-num="02585" class="">Enoch</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">walked</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="07969 03967">300</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>,<n id="2" /> and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.

The <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">lifetime</st> of <st data-num="02585" class="">Enoch</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="02568 07969 03967">365</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>.
Enoch walked with God, and then he disappeared because God took him away.
When Methuselah had lived 187 years, he became the father of Lamech.

<st data-num="04968" class="">Methuselah</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="08147 08084 07651 03967">782</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="03929" class="">Lamech</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Methuselah was 969 years, and then he died.
When Lamech had lived 182 years, he had a son.
He named him Noah, saying, “This one will bring us comfort from our labor and from the painful toil of our hands because of the ground that the Lord has cursed.”

<st data-num="03929" class="">Lamech</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="02568 08673 03967">595</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father of</st> <st data-num="05146" class="">Noah</st>, and he <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.
The entire lifetime of Lamech was 777 years, and then he died.
After Noah was 500 years old, he became the father of Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
